alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, northwestern Dodge, southeastern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Cary, or 9 miles north of Cochran, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Chester, Dudley, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Coley Station, Yonkers, Roddy, Nicklesville, Rowland, Royal, Paulk, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, Rebie, Cary and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
